import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; function ProductScreen(props) { const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails); const { product, loading, error } = productDetails; const dispatch = useDispatch; useEffect(() => { dispatch(detailsProduct()); return () => { } }, []) return
Back to result

  • {product.name}

  • {product.rating} Stars (product.numReviews) Reviews)
  • Price ${product.price}
  • Description:
    {product.description}
  • Price {product.price}
  • Status: {product.status}
  • Qty:
} export default ProductScreen;
